info.name: COSMOS_API_Offboard
info.description:
This Postman collection is part of the hawkBit 101 Tutorial which was developed for EclipseCon 2019.

Its purpose is to demonstrate the public APIs of Eclipse hawkBit, in particular the

- Direct Device Integration API (DDI) and
- Management REST API.
    

There is a separate folder for each part of the tutorial. Each folder contains a couple of requests which are meant to be executed in sequential order.

It is recommended to execute this collection against the hawkBit Docker setup which is available here:  
[https://github.com/stefbehl/hawkbit-101](https://github.com/stefbehl/hawkbit-101)

Step 2.7: Deactivate Target by ID (Mgmt API)
Step 0: Create new Software Module Type
